  16. open Clflags


  19. module Options = Main_args.Make_bytecomp_options (Main_args.Default.Main)

  21. let main argv ppf =
  22.   let program = "ocamlc" in
  23.   Clflags.add_arguments __LOC__ Options.list;
  24.   Clflags.add_arguments __LOC__
  25.     ["-depend", Arg.Unit Makedepend.main_from_option,
  26.      "<options> Compute dependencies (use 'ocamlc -depend -help' for details)"];
  27.   let exception Continue in
  28.   match
  29.     Compenv.readenv ppf Before_args;
  30.     Compenv.parse_arguments (ref argv) Compenv.anonymous program;
  31.     Compmisc.read_clflags_from_env ();
  32.     if !Clflags.plugin then
  33.       Compenv.fatal "-plugin is only supported up to OCaml 4.08.0";
  34.     begin try
  35.       Compenv.process_deferred_actions
  36.         (ppf,
  37.          Compile.implementation,
  38.          Compile.interface,
  39.          ".cmo",
  40.          ".cma");
  41.     with Arg.Bad msg ->
  42.       begin
  43.         prerr_endline msg;
  44.         Clflags.print_arguments program;
  45.         exit 2
  46.       end
  47.     end;
  48.     if Clflags.(should_stop_after Compiler_pass.Lambda)
  49.       then raise Continue;
  50.     Compenv.readenv ppf Before_link;
  51.     if
  52.       List.length
  53.         (List.filter (fun x -> !x)
  54.            [make_archive;make_package;Compenv.stop_early;output_c_object])
  55.         > 1
  56.     then begin
  57.       let module P = Clflags.Compiler_pass in
  58.       match !stop_after with
  59.       | None ->
  60.           Compenv.fatal
  61.             "Please specify at most one of -pack, -a, -c, -output-obj";
  62.       | Some ((P.Parsing | P.Typing | P.Lambda) as p) ->
  63.         assert (P.is_compilation_pass p);
  64.         Printf.ksprintf Compenv.fatal
  65.           "Options -i and -stop-after (%s) \
  66.            are  incompatible with -pack, -a, -output-obj"
  67.           (String.concat "|"
  68.              (P.available_pass_names ~filter:(fun _ -> true) ~native:false))
  69.       | Some (P.Scheduling | P.Emit) -> assert false (* native only *)
  70.     end;
  71.     if !make_archive then begin
  72.       Compmisc.init_path ();

  74.       Bytelibrarian.create_archive
  75.         (Compenv.get_objfiles ~with_ocamlparam:false)
  76.         (Compenv.extract_output !output_name);
  77.       Warnings.check_fatal ();
  78.     end
  79.     else if !make_package then begin
  80.       Compmisc.init_path ();
  81. ‌      let extracted_output = Compenv.extract_output !output_name in
  82. ‌      let revd = Compenv.get_objfiles ~with_ocamlparam:false in
  83.       Compmisc.with_ppf_dump ~file_prefix:extracted_output (fun ppf_dump ->
  84.         Bytepackager.package_files ~ppf_dump (Compmisc.initial_env ())
  85.           revd (extracted_output));
  86.       Warnings.check_fatal ();
  87.     end
  88.     else if not !Compenv.stop_early && !objfiles <> [] then begin
  89. ‌      let target =
  90.         if !output_c_object && not !output_complete_executable then
  91.           let s = Compenv.extract_output !output_name in
  92.           if (Filename.check_suffix s Config.ext_obj
  93.             || Filename.check_suffix s Config.ext_dll
  94.             || Filename.check_suffix s ".c")
  95.           then s
  96.           else
  97.             Compenv.fatal
  98.               (Printf.sprintf
  99.                  "The extension of the output file must be .c, %s or %s"
  100.                  Config.ext_obj Config.ext_dll
  101.               )
  102.         else
  103.           Compenv.default_output !output_name
  104.       in
  105.       Compmisc.init_path ();
  106.       Bytelink.link (Compenv.get_objfiles ~with_ocamlparam:true) target;
  107.       Warnings.check_fatal ();
  108.     end;
  109.   with
  110.   | exception (Compenv.Exit_with_status n) ->
  111.     n
  112.   | exception Continue
  113.   | () ->
  114.     Compmisc.with_ppf_dump ~file_prefix:"profile"
  115.       (fun ppf -> Profile.print ppf !Clflags.profile_columns);
  116.     0
  117.   | exception x ->
  118.   Location.report_exception ppf x;
  119.   2
